title: Firm improves efficiency, more labor, less capital

content.question: Which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The firm is currently maximizing its profit.

The firm can produce more than <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units without increasing the total cost if it uses more labor and less capital.

The firm can produce more than <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units without increasing the total cost if it uses more capital and less labor.

The firm can reduce the cost of producing <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units by using less capital and employing the same amount of labor.

The firm can reduce the cost of producing <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units by employing less labor and using the same amount of capital.

content.answer: The firm can produce more than <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units without increasing the total cost if it uses more labor and less capital.
